Overview:
# Website Department

We made this website for the studio, to present our projects and give information about other departments. It is made with [Node.JS](https://nodejs.org), [TypeScript](https://typescriptlang.org), and [Rollup](https://rollupjs.org/), using [Express](https://expressjs.com/) for serving and [Marked](https://marked.js.org) for markdown rendering.
Development:
# Development Process

For our part of the project, we needed to create 23 webpages for people who are not familiar with web development. Our development process started with people designing the layout of their page, then we created the page using the design. We also made a Discord bot to allow people to change the text on their page after the layout was made, without needing to know how to code.
